definition.text: There's one more tool that you may find useful to manipulate spacetime! The native browser zoom function!

paragraphs.text: Sometimes you may wish to visualize larger sections of the Design Space than your screen allows.
Hit Ctrl and scroll the mouse wheel on Windows or <kbd>âŒ˜</kbd> and <kbd>-</kbd> or <kbd>+</kbd> in Mac.
Chrome indicates the level of zoom on the top-right corner. When zooming in or out, the design space gets centered on the screen. Use the design space map to go back where you were.
